title: Using items cancels movement?
body:
I just got a new keyboard. CM quickfire XT ( mechanical). I noticed that when I use items in between skills ( e.g. {{champion:92}} ) when i go q hydra for an example, the hydra doesn't activate. Also I was trying to use {{item:3143}}  while chasing  an enemy my champ would just stops whenever i press 3 which is binded to the item.


Any ideas ? would it be a keyboard problem? ( no problem using it to play csgo.) 



Ks
